1.extra: MSJH or IHS service learning requirement AKA volunteer hours. Could be one time or ongoing. This is a Done in a Day opportunity with no prior training or ongoing commitment needed. Must be at least 13 years old, with flexible 2-4 hour shifts. Ironing can be done on-site or taken home. This is a virtual opportunity.
1.activity_type: Sorting, barcoding, packaging, light merchandise needs, software maintenance, and ironing
